title: r/Maliciouscompliance "SUE ME!" "Sure! I'll Sue You For $40,000"
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance When will employers learn to stop screwing over their employees? OP has a terrible boss who basically tries to steal wages from OP, but OP isn't having it. He reports his boss's extremely illegal activities to the federal government, which results in getting a massive $40,000 check due to stolen wages! If you like this episode and want to see more, follow my podcast for daily Reddit content!
